pkgmetadata.longdescription: # WowPy## DescriptionThis is a python3 wrapper for wowza cloud api calls## Usage```pip install wowpy``````âžœ python3>>> from wowpy.livestreams import LiveStream>>> LiveStream.get_live_stream('ytzbkw49')Endpoint: https://api.cloud.wowza.com/api/v1.4/live_streams/ytzbkw49, Method: get, Data: {}, Description: not descriptionEndpoint https://api.cloud.wowza.com/api/v1.4/live_streams/ytzbkw49 succesfully reached```
